snippet.title: Hard Glide Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey, I am glad to present you a new demo of my game! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731390/Hard_Glide/

Hard Glide is an experimental arcade game with inertial control using only a mouse. A small fragile bot awakens in the bizarre world of machines and, guided by the voice of the Mainframe, overcomes increasingly difficult levels filled with various hostile bots and obstacles to achieve his main Goal. That's what his Program says. Bonuses and various modifiers are included! 

#skill #shooter #arcade #fast-paced #quick #fast #mouse only #bots #robots #scifi #sci-fi #cyberpunk #dieselpunk #arena #top-down #experimental #indie #orbs #avoid #avoider #destruction #blast #collect
